# Changelog

## 2.5.6 (2015-05-17)

- Synchronize version number with [paranoid-auto-spacing](https://github.com/vinta/paranoid-auto-spacing)

## 1.2.0 (2015-05-17)

- Improve Paranoid Text Spacing algorithm
- Improve spacing performance

## 1.1.0 (2015-05-11)

- Improve Paranoid Text Spacing algorithm
- `pangu-axe` accepts multiple files

## 1.0.0 (2015-05-03)

- Bang! Release!
